parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns number of seconds auto-scroll will wait before scroll and/or rewind. -2 if scrollbar not present. 
<br><br>
Autorscroll is available for [[DialogControls-ListBoxes|CT_LISTBOX]] and [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]] types of controls only. Autoscroll will wait [[ctrlAutoScrollDelay]] seconds (must be  > 0) and then will scroll the scroll bar down to the bottom. [[ctrlAutoScrollSpeed]] defines the speed with which scrollbar is scrolled. If [[ctrlAutoScrollRewind]] is [[true]], the control will fade out, immediately rewind to the top, then fade in, wait [[ctrlAutoScrollDelay]] seconds and then repeat the scrolling in a loop. If user focuses on the control, autoscrolling is interrupted.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlAutoScrollDelay''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[DialogControls-ListBoxes|CT_LISTBOX]] or [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrlDelay = [[ctrlAutoScrollDelay]] _ctrlGroup;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetAutoScrollSpeed]], [[ctrlAutoScrollSpeed]], [[ctrlSetAutoScrollDelay]], [[ctrlSetAutoScrollRewind]], [[ctrlAutoScrollRewind]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
